title: What Semrush Social can help you with
content:
Semrush Social

Semrush Social gives you numerous tools to create your strategy and make your social media routine easier. These tools help assist the workflow of anyone who manages social media. The tools allow you to create and schedule posts, monitor their performance, benchmark your progress against competitors, and communicate with users more efficiently.

Social Dashboard
Social Poster
Social Tracker
Social Analytics
Social Content Insights

Semrush Social can be purchased as an add-on for a paid Semrush subscription for $29.99/month, or as a stand-alone solution that can be purchased separately from the core Semrush.  

The limits in each tool will depend on the level of your subscription:

 	

Social subscription

	Pro subscription	Guru subscription	Business subscription
Projects	1	5	15	40

For more information about Semrush Social limits, visit our Subscription Limits page.

In addition to the Semrush Social subscription, you can purchase Social Content AI for $29.99/month. 

Go to Semrush Social

Social Poster

Social Content AI

Now that you know the basics of our Semrush Social app it's time to dive deeper. Check out our Social Media user manuals and how-to articles found in this Knowledge Base. These articles can help you gain a more in-depth understanding of this toolkit.

Should you experience any trouble connecting profiles in the Semrush Social app, you can use this article to troubleshoot the problem.
